reviewText: The recording quality is clean, and the music...well, the music puts you in the moment with all the rare songs and every snarky comment Chris casually tosses out (you can tell they're very "inside" but you know he's sniping at Rich. The CD + DVD is a rare bird, indeed -- especially at the amazing price for which I purchased it. In fact, I am gonna play "Brothers of a Feather" right now. I suggest you do the same.
